section.title: Browse latest files
section.p: You can see the latest ai4r code directly in your browser: http://ai4r.rubyforge.org/svn/
section.warning: The latest code in http://ai4r.rubyforge.org/svn/trunk will probably be a work in progess. If you want something that works, please download the releases.

section.title: Source code evolution
section.p: Soft Sizo is a report generation tool that extends the concept of Lines Of Code (LOC) metrics, using changes information stored in a Subversion repository.
You can access AI4R Soft Sizo report for some AI4R source code evolution metrics.
